forecast.day_comments: Snow.  Steady temperature around 32. South wind around 5 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow before 11am, then snow showers likely between 11am and 2pm, then snow likely after 2pm. Some thunder is also possible.  High near 40. South wind 3 to 6 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
